item.title: Report E-2024110449
item.description:
Report E-2024110449

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-22T12:30:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-07
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately g=four (4) gallons of material released from one (1) 5-gallon plastic jug due to improper handling. The released material impacted the asphalt lot and the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted areas. The spent absorbents were recovered and containerized into one (1) 15-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024110386
item.description:
Report E-2024110386

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-21T12:39:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-14
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of material released from one (1) 1-gallon plastic jug due to an unknown cause. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton personnel properly cleaned the impacted area and containerized the cleanup debris and damaged jug into one (1) 10-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024110333
item.description:
Report E-2024110333

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-21T12:39:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-30
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of product released from three (3) five (5) gallon metal pails. The release impacted trailer floor. Personnel advised they cleaned up with release using Oil Dri absorbent. Dayton Freight personnel confirmed the completed cleanup and generated two (2) five (5) gallon poly drums of waste, one containing spent absorbent and product released, the second containing the three (3) five (5) gallon metal pails of impacted product. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
